meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Watch List's Security Issue A federal report says the master terror watch list put nearly 32,000 ''armed and dangerous'' suspects at the lowest security level.
Italy's Fertility Law Vote Fails An Italian referendum to ease a law on assisted fertility failed to garner the 50 percent voter participation required for it to be valid.

Iraqi Court Releases Videotape of a Subdued Hussein The Iraqi Special Tribunal released a two-minute videotape, with no sound, showing part of the interrogation of Saddam Hussein, who seemed to respond carefully and quietly to a judge's questions.

Capitalists in Space By underwriting SpaceShipOne, a manned rocket that was the first privately financed craft to fly to the cusp of space, Paul G. Allen became the best-known member of a growing club of ''space geeks'' that includes some of the world's richest entrepreneurs.
Watch List's Security Issue A federal report says the master terror watch list put nearly 32,000 ''armed and dangerous'' suspects at the lowest security level.
Italy's Fertility Law Vote Fails An Italian referendum to ease a law on assisted fertility failed to garner the 50 percent voter participation required for it to be valid.

Iraqi Court Releases Videotape of a Subdued Hussein The Iraqi Special Tribunal released a two-minute videotape, with no sound, showing part of the interrogation of Saddam Hussein, who seemed to respond carefully and quietly to a judge's questions.

Capitalists in Space By underwriting SpaceShipOne, a manned rocket that was the first privately financed craft to fly to the cusp of space, Paul G. Allen became the best-known member of a growing club of ''space geeks'' that includes some of the world's richest entrepreneurs.
